result.markdown: --- title: "Week 3: Time series decomposition" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Transforming data to remove some sources of variation * Decomposing a time series into trend-cycle, seasonal and remainder components * Seasonal adjustment ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 6, 8-11 from [Section 2.10 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/graphics-exercises.html). ## Exercise solutions ## Assignments * [GA1](../assignments/G1.qmd) is due on Monday 24 March.
